name: Aidan and Devin Volume 2 The Game
name_original: Aidan and Devin Volume 2 The Game
description:
Move with arrow keys. On mobile, swipe up, down, left and right to move.

This game was created to celebrate the release of Aidan and Devin Volume 2 which will be available on July 3rd, 2020 at https://aidananddevin.bandcamp.com/
